content: for your support i hope that you enjoy making this pattern if you have any questions about this pattern find any mistakes or have suggestions at all please feel free to reach out to me via e-mail bombercrafts@hotmail com or instagram dm @bombercrafts *see disclaimer at end of pattern - a very small amount of 2 colors of your 1 the sour gummy worm pattern base is the same for all the choice premier parfait chunky or hobbii worms the size of the worms will differ based on yarn used i e baby snuggle or l&t sweet snuggle lite or baby snuggle makes a smaller worm versus chenille home slim l&t chenille home slim or similar weight which makes a bigger worm play around with the color changes to plush yarn otherwise you will need to customize to your liking but color change instructions are adjust hook size to match yarn of choice included in the pattern too *i used l&t sweet snuggle in coral and turquoise for the 2 pattern is written in continuous rounds to minimize sewing sample in pictures you do not slip_stitch or chain at the end of rounds or fasten_off unless specifically indicated -5mm hook or 2 sizes smaller than yarn s label -polyester stuffing small amount 3 always pm place marker in first stitch at beginning of rounds -chopstick/stuffing tool a pen will work & move it up each round to help keep track of where you are -8mm plastic safety cute eyes amazon 4 when changing colors finish the previous stitch/single_crochet *if you are making this for children under 3 years old or by pulling through with the next color when finishing it this is someone who may pick them off avoid using plastic safety called an invisible color change feel free to look up videos on eyes instead try embroidered eyes crocheted eyes or even youtube of this method it is very useful to learn for projects cutting out tiny felt circles and sew them on the head involving colorwork *alternatively you can make your sour gummy worm a solid color instead -24/7 lion brand cotton in black to attach the keychain to the worm 5 this pattern is a great stash buster for small amounts of -keychain rings amazon leftover yarn you will not need much yarn at all -yarn needle stitch marker scissors & 6 i may create additional patterns for larger versions of this worm measuring tape later… but for now i invite you to have fun with this pattern try your favorite color combos and yarns & feel free to tag me in your creations on tiktok insta or facebook @bombercrafts pm=place stitch marker increase=increase the finished sour gummy worm single_crochet=single_crochet chain=chain measures approximately 5 tall and is mc=main colour st=stitch approximately 1 wide this pattern is cc=complimentary colour magic_ring=magic_ring meant to be a tiny plush keychain that is
